title: Is it worth it to buy an iPhone 6S Plus in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes only if you have budget constraints and just want to own an iphone for the heck of it. However, it is highly unlikely that Apple will roll out further ios for 6s lineups. Phone should still work for a good period of time as it is on ios14 now and apps would support this version for quite some time
